thread.title: WATCH: Tucker Carlson Takes Down Woman Who Organized Violent Berkeley Protests
thread.title_full: WATCH: Tucker Carlson Takes Down Woman Who Organized Violent Berkeley Protests

author: K. Campbell
title: WATCH: Tucker Carlson Takes Down Woman Who Organized Violent Berkeley Protests
text:
WATCH: Judge Jeanine Takes Shot at “Loud, Classless” Women Boycotting Ivanka 
Felarca, who heads up the Coalition to Defend Affirmative Action, Integration, and Immigrant Rights and Fight for Equality By Any Means Necessary (informally known as BAMN ), was no stranger to using violent methods to silence others. 
For example, as Carlson pointed out, the liberal activist attacked a man with whom she disagreed politically during last summer’s riots in Sacramento . 
Felarca, who is also a public school teacher, said her tactics and the tactics used by liberal students and rioters at UC Berkeley earlier this month should be used by anyone who witnesses “fascist” rhetoric.   
“A fascist is someone who’s organizing a mass movement that’s attacking women, immigrants, black people, other minority groups in a movement of genocide,” she explained. 
When Carlson asked her about how violence plays into someone being a “fascist,” her answer was telling — and arguably self-incriminating. 
A fascist is “someone who is committing violence and is trying to organize others to commit violence.” 
But, Yvette, don’t you commit violence and try to organize others to join you? (see: Sacramento and Berkeley, just for starters)
